text: we are going to dive into option liquidity what it is what to look for how to assess it I'm going to give you a checklist I'm going to give you some real examples along the way so that you understand what it actually looks like in a practical scenario what things impact it and how so at the end of the video you should have a really good understanding of how to assess and find liquid options what's up everyone Eric here welcome back to all the outliers shout out to the patreon family Let's Get Right In so what is option liquidity it's essentially the ability to transact at a fair price when you want the vast majority of instances where retail Traders are putting in orders we are consuming liquidity because we are placing an order it gets filled you've just taken an order off the market that somebody else could have used and somebody gave you the ability to transact there that's liquidity now if you submit an order and it's resting well then actually you're giving somebody else the ability to trade you're providing liquidity with that position so just some Nuance now I want to talk about some of the massive mistakes people make with respect to liquidity and this is the biggest one there are two key components of an options trade the entry and the exit Traders are really good at analyzing liquidity when we're trying to get in once we know
